widgets.name: AboutDialog
widgets.description: An about box. This is a dialog box with the application's icon, name, version number, and copyright, plus a button to show licenses for software used by the application.

widgets.name: AboutListTile
widgets.description: A [ListTile] that shows an about box.

widgets.name: AbsorbPointer
widgets.description: A widget that absorbs pointers during hit testing.

widgets.name: ActionChip
widgets.description: A material design action chip.

widgets.name: ActionListener
widgets.description: A helper widget for making sure that listeners on an action are removed properly.

widgets.name: Actions
widgets.description: A widget that establishes an [ActionDispatcher] and a map of [Intent] to [Action] to be used by its descendants when invoking an [Action].

widgets.name: AlertDialog
widgets.description: A material design alert dialog.

widgets.name: Align
widgets.description: A widget that aligns its child within itself and optionally sizes itself based on the child's size.

widgets.name: AlignTransition
widgets.description: Animated version of an [Align] that animates its [Align.alignment] property.

widgets.name: AndroidView
widgets.description: Embeds an Android view in the Widget hierarchy.

widgets.name: AndroidViewSurface
widgets.description: Integrates an Android view with Flutter's compositor, touch, and semantics subsystems.

widgets.name: AnimatedAlign
widgets.description: Animated version of [Align] which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given [alignment] changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedBuilder
widgets.description: A general-purpose widget for building animations.

widgets.name: AnimatedContainer
widgets.description: Animated version of [Container] that gradually changes its values over a period of time.

widgets.name: AnimatedCrossFade
widgets.description: A widget that cross-fades between two given children and animates itself between their sizes.

widgets.name: AnimatedDefaultTextStyle
widgets.description: Animated version of [DefaultTextStyle] which automatically transitions the default text style (the text style to apply to descendant [Text] widgets without explicit style) over a given duration whenever the given style changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedIcon
widgets.description: Shows an animated icon at a given animation [progress].

widgets.name: AnimatedList
widgets.description: A scrolling container that animates items when they are inserted or removed.

widgets.name: AnimatedModalBarrier
widgets.description: A widget that prevents the user from interacting with widgets behind itself, and can be configured with an animated color value.

widgets.name: AnimatedOpacity
widgets.description: Animated version of [Opacity] which automatically transitions the child's opacity over a given duration whenever the given opacity changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedPadding
widgets.description: Animated version of [Padding] which automatically transitions the indentation over a given duration whenever the given inset changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedPhysicalModel
widgets.description: Animated version of [PhysicalModel].

widgets.name: AnimatedPositioned
widgets.description: Animated version of [Positioned] which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given position changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedPositionedDirectional
widgets.description: Animated version of [PositionedDirectional] which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given position changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedRotation
widgets.description: Animated version of [Transform.rotate] which automatically transitions the child's rotation over a given duration whenever the given rotation changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedScale
widgets.description: Animated version of [Transform.scale] which automatically transitions the child's scale over a given duration whenever the given scale changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedSize
widgets.description: Animated widget that automatically transitions its size over a given duration whenever the given child's size changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedSlide
widgets.description: Widget which automatically transitions the child's offset relative to its normal position whenever the given offset changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedSwitcher
widgets.description: A widget that by default does a cross-fade between a new widget and the widget previously set on the [AnimatedSwitcher] as a child.

widgets.name: AnimatedTheme
widgets.description: Animated version of [Theme] which automatically transitions the colors, etc, over a given duration whenever the given theme changes.

widgets.name: AnimatedWidget
widgets.description: A widget that rebuilds when the given [Listenable] changes value.

widgets.name: AnnotatedRegion
widgets.description: Annotates a region of the layer tree with a value.

widgets.name: AppBar
widgets.description: A material design app bar.

widgets.name: AspectRatio
widgets.description: A widget that attempts to size the child to a specific aspect ratio.

widgets.name: Autocomplete
widgets.description: {@macro flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.RawAutocomplete}

widgets.name: AutocompleteHighlightedOption
widgets.description: An inherited widget used to indicate which autocomplete option should be highlighted for keyboard navigation.

widgets.name: AutofillGroup
widgets.description: An [AutofillScope] widget that groups [AutofillClient]s together.

widgets.name: AutomaticKeepAlive
widgets.description: Allows subtrees to request to be kept alive in lazy lists.

widgets.name: BackButton
widgets.description: A material design back button.

widgets.name: BackButtonIcon
widgets.description: A "back" icon that's appropriate for the current [TargetPlatform].

widgets.name: BackButtonListener
widgets.description: A convenience widget that registers a callback for when the back button is pressed.

widgets.name: BackdropFilter
widgets.description: A widget that applies a filter to the existing painted content and then paints [child].

widgets.name: Banner
widgets.description: Displays a diagonal message above the corner of another widget.

widgets.name: Baseline
widgets.description: A widget that positions its child according to the child's baseline.

widgets.name: BlockSemantics
widgets.description: A widget that drops the semantics of all widget that were painted before it in the same semantic container.

widgets.name: BottomAppBar
widgets.description: A container that is typically used with [Scaffold.bottomNavigationBar], and can have a notch along the top that makes room for an overlapping [FloatingActionButton].

widgets.name: BottomNavigationBar
widgets.description: A material widget that's displayed at the bottom of an app for selecting among a small number of views, typically between three and five.

widgets.name: BottomNavigationBarTheme
widgets.description: Applies a bottom navigation bar theme to descendant [BottomNavigationBar] widgets.

widgets.name: BottomSheet
widgets.description: A material design bottom sheet.

widgets.name: BoxScrollView
widgets.description: A [ScrollView] that uses a single child layout model.

widgets.name: Builder
widgets.description: A stateless utility widget whose [build] method uses its [builder] callback to create the widget's child.

widgets.name: ButtonBar
widgets.description: An end-aligned row of buttons, laying out into a column if there is not enough horizontal space.

widgets.name: ButtonBarTheme
widgets.description: Applies a button bar theme to descendant [ButtonBar] widgets.

widgets.name: ButtonStyleButton
widgets.description: The base [StatefulWidget] class for buttons whose style is defined by a [ButtonStyle] object.

widgets.name: ButtonTheme
widgets.description: Used with [ButtonThemeData] to configure the color and geometry of buttons.

widgets.name: CalendarDatePicker
widgets.description: Displays a grid of days for a given month and allows the user to select a date.

widgets.name: CallbackShortcuts
widgets.description: A widget that provides an uncomplicated mechanism for binding a key combination to a specific callback.

widgets.name: Card
widgets.description: A material design card: a panel with slightly rounded corners and an elevation shadow.

widgets.name: Center
widgets.description: A widget that centers its child within itself.

widgets.name: Checkbox
widgets.description: A material design checkbox.

widgets.name: CheckboxListTile
widgets.description: A [ListTile] with a [Checkbox]. In other words, a checkbox with a label.

widgets.name: CheckboxTheme
widgets.description: Applies a checkbox theme to descendant [Checkbox] widgets.

widgets.name: CheckedModeBanner
widgets.description: Displays a [Banner] saying "DEBUG" when running in debug mode. [MaterialApp] builds one of these by default. Does nothing in release mode.

widgets.name: CheckedPopupMenuItem
widgets.description: An item with a checkmark in a material design popup menu.

widgets.name: Chip
widgets.description: A material design chip.

widgets.name: ChipTheme
widgets.description: Applies a chip theme to descendant [RawChip]-based widgets, like [Chip], [InputChip], [ChoiceChip], [FilterChip], and [ActionChip].

widgets.name: ChoiceChip
widgets.description: A material design choice chip.

widgets.name: CircleAvatar
widgets.description: A circle that represents a user.

widgets.name: CircularProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A material design circular progress indicator, which spins to indicate that the application is busy.

widgets.name: ClipOval
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using an oval.

widgets.name: ClipPath
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a path.

widgets.name: ClipRRect
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a rounded rectangle.

widgets.name: ClipRect
widgets.description: A widget that clips its child using a rectangle.

widgets.name: CloseButton
widgets.description: A material design close button.

widgets.name: ColorFiltered
widgets.description: Applies a [ColorFilter] to its child.

widgets.name: ColoredBox
widgets.description: A widget that paints its area with a specified [Color] and then draws its child on top of that color.

widgets.name: Column
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in a vertical array.

widgets.name: CompositedTransformFollower
widgets.description: A widget that follows a [CompositedTransformTarget].

widgets.name: CompositedTransformTarget
widgets.description: A widget that can be targeted by a [CompositedTransformFollower].

widgets.name: ConstrainedBox
widgets.description: A widget that imposes additional constraints on its child.

widgets.name: ConstrainedLayoutBuilder
widgets.description: An abstract superclass for widgets that defer their building until layout.

widgets.name: ConstraintsTransformBox
widgets.description: A container widget that applies an arbitrary transform to its constraints, and sizes its child using the resulting [BoxConstraints], treating any overflow as error.

widgets.name: Container
widgets.description: A convenience widget that combines common painting, positioning, and sizing widgets.

widgets.name: CupertinoActionSheet
widgets.description: An iOS-style action sheet.

widgets.name: CupertinoActionSheetAction
widgets.description: A button typically used in a [CupertinoActionSheet].

widgets.name: CupertinoActivityIndicator
widgets.description: An iOS-style activity indicator that spins clockwise.

widgets.name: CupertinoAlertDialog
widgets.description: An iOS-style alert dialog.

widgets.name: CupertinoApp
widgets.description: An application that uses Cupertino design.

widgets.name: CupertinoButton
widgets.description: An iOS-style button.

widgets.name: CupertinoContextMenu
widgets.description: A full-screen modal route that opens when the [child] is long-pressed.

widgets.name: CupertinoContextMenuAction
widgets.description: A button in a _ContextMenuSheet.

widgets.name: CupertinoDatePicker
widgets.description: A date picker widget in iOS style.

widgets.name: CupertinoDialogAction
widgets.description: A button typically used in a [CupertinoAlertDialog].

widgets.name: CupertinoFormRow
widgets.description: An iOS-style form row.

widgets.name: CupertinoFormSection
widgets.description: An iOS-style form section.

widgets.name: CupertinoFullscreenDialogTransition
widgets.description: An iOS-style transition used for summoning fullscreen dialogs.

widgets.name: CupertinoNavigationBar
widgets.description: An iOS-styled navigation bar.

widgets.name: CupertinoNavigationBarBackButton
widgets.description: A nav bar back button typically used in [CupertinoNavigationBar].

widgets.name: CupertinoPageScaffold
widgets.description: Implements a single iOS application page's layout.

widgets.name: CupertinoPageTransition
widgets.description: Provides an iOS-style page transition animation.

widgets.name: CupertinoPicker
widgets.description: An iOS-styled picker.

widgets.name: CupertinoPickerDefaultSelectionOverlay
widgets.description: A default selection overlay for [CupertinoPicker]s.

widgets.name: CupertinoPopupSurface
widgets.description: Rounded rectangle surface that looks like an iOS popup surface, e.g., alert dialog and action sheet.

widgets.name: CupertinoScrollbar
widgets.description: An iOS style scrollbar.

widgets.name: CupertinoSearchTextField
widgets.description: A [CupertinoTextField] that mimics the look and behavior of UIKit's `UISearchTextField`.

widgets.name: CupertinoSegmentedControl
widgets.description: An iOS-style segmented control.

widgets.name: CupertinoSlider
widgets.description: An iOS-style slider.

widgets.name: CupertinoSlidingSegmentedControl
widgets.description: An iOS 13 style segmented control.

widgets.name: CupertinoSliverNavigationBar
widgets.description: An iOS-styled navigation bar with iOS-11-style large titles using slivers.

widgets.name: CupertinoSliverRefreshControl
widgets.description: A sliver widget implementing the iOS-style pull to refresh content control.

widgets.name: CupertinoSwitch
widgets.description: An iOS-style switch.

widgets.name: CupertinoTabBar
widgets.description: An iOS-styled bottom navigation tab bar.

widgets.name: CupertinoTabScaffold
widgets.description: Implements a tabbed iOS application's root layout and behavior structure.

widgets.name: CupertinoTabView
widgets.description: A single tab view with its own [Navigator] state and history.

widgets.name: CupertinoTextField
widgets.description: An iOS-style text field.

widgets.name: CupertinoTextFormFieldRow
widgets.description: Creates a [CupertinoFormRow] containing a [FormField] that wraps a [CupertinoTextField].

widgets.name: CupertinoTextSelectionToolbar
widgets.description: An iOS-style text selection toolbar.

widgets.name: CupertinoTextSelectionToolbarButton
widgets.description: A button in the style of the iOS text selection toolbar buttons.

widgets.name: CupertinoTheme
widgets.description: Applies a visual styling theme to descendant Cupertino widgets.

widgets.name: CupertinoTimerPicker
widgets.description: A countdown timer picker in iOS style.

widgets.name: CupertinoUserInterfaceLevel
widgets.description: Establishes a subtree in which [CupertinoUserInterfaceLevel.of] resolves to the given data.

widgets.name: CustomMultiChildLayout
widgets.description: A widget that uses a delegate to size and position multiple children.

widgets.name: CustomPaint
widgets.description: A widget that provides a canvas on which to draw during the paint phase.

widgets.name: CustomScrollView
widgets.description: A [ScrollView] that creates custom scroll effects using slivers.

widgets.name: CustomSingleChildLayout
widgets.description: A widget that defers the layout of its single child to a delegate.

widgets.name: DataTable
widgets.description: A material design data table.

widgets.name: DataTableTheme
widgets.description: Applies a data table theme to descendant [DataTable] widgets.

widgets.name: DatePickerDialog
widgets.description: A Material-style date picker dialog.

widgets.name: DateRangePickerDialog
widgets.description: A Material-style date range picker dialog.

widgets.name: DecoratedBox
widgets.description: A widget that paints a [Decoration] either before or after its child paints.

widgets.name: DecoratedBoxTransition
widgets.description: Animated version of a [DecoratedBox] that animates the different properties of its [Decoration].

widgets.name: DefaultAssetBundle
widgets.description: A widget that determines the default asset bundle for its descendants.

widgets.name: DefaultSelectionStyle
widgets.description: The selection style to apply to descendant [EditableText] widgets which don't have an explicit style.

widgets.name: DefaultTabController
widgets.description: The [TabController] for descendant widgets that don't specify one explicitly.

widgets.name: DefaultTextEditingShortcuts
widgets.description: A [Shortcuts] widget with the shortcuts used for the default text editing behavior.

widgets.name: DefaultTextHeightBehavior
widgets.description: The [TextHeightBehavior] that will apply to descendant [Text] and [EditableText] widgets which have not explicitly set [Text.textHeightBehavior].

widgets.name: DefaultTextStyle
widgets.description: The text style to apply to descendant [Text] widgets which don't have an explicit style.

widgets.name: DefaultTextStyleTransition
widgets.description: Animated version of a [DefaultTextStyle] that animates the different properties of its [TextStyle].

widgets.name: Dialog
widgets.description: A material design dialog.

widgets.name: Directionality
widgets.description: A widget that determines the ambient directionality of text and text-direction-sensitive render objects.

widgets.name: Dismissible
widgets.description: A widget that can be dismissed by dragging in the indicated [direction].

widgets.name: DisplayFeatureSubScreen
widgets.description: Positions [child] such that it avoids overlapping any [DisplayFeature] that splits the screen into sub-screens.

widgets.name: Divider
widgets.description: A thin horizontal line, with padding on either side.

widgets.name: DividerTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for [Divider]s, [VerticalDivider]s, dividers between [ListTile]s, and dividers between rows in [DataTable]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: DragTarget
widgets.description: A widget that receives data when a [Draggable] widget is dropped.

widgets.name: Draggable
widgets.description: A widget that can be dragged from to a [DragTarget].

widgets.name: DraggableScrollableActuator
widgets.description: A widget that can notify a descendent [DraggableScrollableSheet] that it should reset its position to the initial state.

widgets.name: DraggableScrollableSheet
widgets.description: A container for a [Scrollable] that responds to drag gestures by resizing the scrollable until a limit is reached, and then scrolling.

widgets.name: Drawer
widgets.description: A material design panel that slides in horizontally from the edge of a [Scaffold] to show navigation links in an application.

widgets.name: DrawerController
widgets.description: Provides interactive behavior for [Drawer] widgets.

widgets.name: DrawerHeader
widgets.description: The top-most region of a material design drawer. The header's [child] widget, if any, is placed inside a [Container] whose [decoration] can be passed as an argument, inset by the given [padding].

widgets.name: DrawerTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines visual properties for [Drawer]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: DropdownButton
widgets.description: A material design button for selecting from a list of items.

widgets.name: DropdownButtonFormField
widgets.description: A [FormField] that contains a [DropdownButton].

widgets.name: DropdownButtonHideUnderline
widgets.description: An inherited widget that causes any descendant [DropdownButton] widgets to not include their regular underline.

widgets.name: DropdownMenuItem
widgets.description: An item in a menu created by a [DropdownButton].

widgets.name: DualTransitionBuilder
widgets.description: A transition builder that animates its [child] based on the [AnimationStatus] of the provided [animation].

widgets.name: EditableText
widgets.description: A basic text input field.

widgets.name: ElevatedButton
widgets.description: A Material Design "elevated button".

widgets.name: ElevatedButtonTheme
widgets.description: Overrides the default [ButtonStyle] of its [ElevatedButton] descendants.

widgets.name: ErrorWidget
widgets.description: A widget that renders an exception's message.

widgets.name: ExcludeFocus
widgets.description: A widget that controls whether or not the descendants of this widget are focusable.

widgets.name: ExcludeFocusTraversal
widgets.description: A widget that controls whether or not the descendants of this widget are traversable.

widgets.name: ExcludeSemantics
widgets.description: A widget that drops all the semantics of its descendants.

widgets.name: ExpandIcon
widgets.description: A widget representing a rotating expand/collapse button. The icon rotates 180 degrees when pressed, then reverts the animation on a second press. The underlying icon is [Icons.expand_more].

widgets.name: Expanded
widgets.description: A widget that expands a child of a [Row], [Column], or [Flex] so that the child fills the available space.

widgets.name: ExpansionPanelList
widgets.description: A material expansion panel list that lays out its children and animates expansions.

widgets.name: ExpansionTile
widgets.description: A single-line [ListTile] with an expansion arrow icon that expands or collapses the tile to reveal or hide the [children].

widgets.name: ExpansionTileTheme
widgets.description: Overrides the default [ExpansionTileTheme] of its [ExpansionTile] descendants.

widgets.name: FadeInImage
widgets.description: An image that shows a [placeholder] image while the target [image] is loading, then fades in the new image when it loads.

widgets.name: FadeTransition
widgets.description: Animates the opacity of a widget.

widgets.name: FilterChip
widgets.description: A material design filter chip.

widgets.name: FittedBox
widgets.description: Scales and positions its child within itself according to [fit].

widgets.name: Flex
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in a one-dimensional array.

widgets.name: Flexible
widgets.description: A widget that controls how a child of a [Row], [Column], or [Flex] flexes.

widgets.name: FlexibleSpaceBar
widgets.description: The part of a material design [AppBar] that expands, collapses, and stretches.

widgets.name: FlexibleSpaceBarSettings
widgets.description: Provides sizing and opacity information to a [FlexibleSpaceBar].

widgets.name: FloatingActionButton
widgets.description: A material design floating action button.

widgets.name: Flow
widgets.description: A widget that sizes and positions children efficiently, according to the logic in a [FlowDelegate].

widgets.name: FlutterLogo
widgets.description: The Flutter logo, in widget form. This widget respects the [IconTheme]. For guidelines on using the Flutter logo, visit https://flutter.dev/brand.

widgets.name: Focus
widgets.description: A widget that manages a [FocusNode] to allow keyboard focus to be given to this widget and its descendants.

widgets.name: FocusScope
widgets.description: A [FocusScope] is similar to a [Focus], but also serves as a scope for its descendants, restricting focus traversal to the scoped controls.

widgets.name: FocusTrap
widgets.description: The [FocusTrap] widget removes focus when a mouse primary pointer makes contact with another region of the screen.

widgets.name: FocusTrapArea
widgets.description: Declares a widget subtree which is part of the provided [focusNode]'s focus area without attaching focus to that region.

widgets.name: FocusTraversalGroup
widgets.description: A widget that describes the inherited focus policy for focus traversal for its descendants, grouping them into a separate traversal group.

widgets.name: FocusTraversalOrder
widgets.description: An inherited widget that describes the order in which its child subtree should be traversed.

widgets.name: FocusableActionDetector
widgets.description: A widget that combines the functionality of [Actions], [Shortcuts], [MouseRegion] and a [Focus] widget to create a detector that defines actions and key bindings, and provides callbacks for handling focus and hover highlights.

widgets.name: Form
widgets.description: An optional container for grouping together multiple form field widgets (e.g. [TextField] widgets).

widgets.name: FormField
widgets.description: A single form field.

widgets.name: FractionalTranslation
widgets.description: Applies a translation transformation before painting its child.

widgets.name: FractionallySizedBox
widgets.description: A widget that sizes its child to a fraction of the total available space. For more details about the layout algorithm, see [RenderFractionallySizedOverflowBox].

widgets.name: FutureBuilder
widgets.description: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a [Future].

widgets.name: GestureDetector
widgets.description: A widget that detects gestures.

widgets.name: GlowingOverscrollIndicator
widgets.description: A visual indication that a scroll view has overscrolled.

widgets.name: GridPaper
widgets.description: A widget that draws a rectilinear grid of lines one pixel wide.

widgets.name: GridTile
widgets.description: A tile in a material design grid list.

widgets.name: GridTileBar
widgets.description: A header used in a material design [GridTile].

widgets.name: GridView
widgets.description: A scrollable, 2D array of widgets.

widgets.name: Hero
widgets.description: A widget that marks its child as being a candidate for [hero animations](https://flutter.dev/docs/development/ui/animations/hero-animations).

widgets.name: HeroControllerScope
widgets.description: An inherited widget to host a hero controller.

widgets.name: HeroMode
widgets.description: Enables or disables [Hero]es in the widget subtree.

widgets.name: HtmlElementView
widgets.description: Embeds an HTML element in the Widget hierarchy in Flutter Web.

widgets.name: Icon
widgets.description: A graphical icon widget drawn with a glyph from a font described in an [IconData] such as material's predefined [IconData]s in [Icons].

widgets.name: IconButton
widgets.description: A material design icon button.

widgets.name: IconTheme
widgets.description: Controls the default color, opacity, and size of icons in a widget subtree.

widgets.name: IgnorePointer
widgets.description: A widget that is invisible during hit testing.

widgets.name: Image
widgets.description: A widget that displays an image.

widgets.name: ImageFiltered
widgets.description: Applies an [ImageFilter] to its child.

widgets.name: ImageIcon
widgets.description: An icon that comes from an [ImageProvider], e.g. an [AssetImage].

widgets.name: ImplicitlyAnimatedWidget
widgets.description: An abstract class for building widgets that animate changes to their properties.

widgets.name: IndexedSemantics
widgets.description: A widget that annotates the child semantics with an index.

widgets.name: IndexedStack
widgets.description: A [Stack] that shows a single child from a list of children.

widgets.name: InheritedModel
widgets.description: An [InheritedWidget] that's intended to be used as the base class for models whose dependents may only depend on one part or "aspect" of the overall model.

widgets.name: InheritedNotifier
widgets.description: An inherited widget for a [Listenable] [notifier], which updates its dependencies when the [notifier] is triggered.

widgets.name: InheritedTheme
widgets.description: An [InheritedWidget] that defines visual properties like colors and text styles, which the [child]'s subtree depends on.

widgets.name: InheritedWidget
widgets.description: Base class for widgets that efficiently propagate information down the tree.

widgets.name: Ink
widgets.description: A convenience widget for drawing images and other decorations on [Material] widgets, so that [InkWell] and [InkResponse] splashes will render over them.

widgets.name: InkResponse
widgets.description: An area of a [Material] that responds to touch. Has a configurable shape and can be configured to clip splashes that extend outside its bounds or not.

widgets.name: InkWell
widgets.description: A rectangular area of a [Material] that responds to touch.

widgets.name: InputChip
widgets.description: A material design input chip.

widgets.name: InputDatePickerFormField
widgets.description: A [TextFormField] configured to accept and validate a date entered by a user.

widgets.name: InputDecorator
widgets.description: Defines the appearance of a Material Design text field.

widgets.name: InteractiveViewer
widgets.description: A widget that enables pan and zoom interactions with its child.

widgets.name: IntrinsicHeight
widgets.description: A widget that sizes its child to the child's intrinsic height.

widgets.name: IntrinsicWidth
widgets.description: A widget that sizes its child to the child's maximum intrinsic width.

widgets.name: KeepAlive
widgets.description: Mark a child as needing to stay alive even when it's in a lazy list that would otherwise remove it.

widgets.name: KeyboardListener
widgets.description: A widget that calls a callback whenever the user presses or releases a key on a keyboard.

widgets.name: KeyedSubtree
widgets.description: A widget that builds its child.

widgets.name: LayoutBuilder
widgets.description: Builds a widget tree that can depend on the parent widget's size.

widgets.name: LayoutId
widgets.description: Metadata for identifying children in a [CustomMultiChildLayout].

widgets.name: LeafRenderObjectWidget
widgets.description: A superclass for RenderObjectWidgets that configure RenderObject subclasses that have no children.

widgets.name: LicensePage
widgets.description: A page that shows licenses for software used by the application.

widgets.name: LimitedBox
widgets.description: A box that limits its size only when it's unconstrained.

widgets.name: LinearProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A material design linear progress indicator, also known as a progress bar.

widgets.name: ListBody
widgets.description: A widget that arranges its children sequentially along a given axis, forcing them to the dimension of the parent in the other axis.

widgets.name: ListTile
widgets.description: A single fixed-height row that typically contains some text as well as a leading or trailing icon.

widgets.name: ListTileTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines color and style parameters for [ListTile]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: ListView
widgets.description: A scrollable list of widgets arranged linearly.

widgets.name: ListWheelScrollView
widgets.description: A box in which children on a wheel can be scrolled.

widgets.name: ListWheelViewport
widgets.description: A viewport showing a subset of children on a wheel.

widgets.name: Listener
widgets.description: A widget that calls callbacks in response to common pointer events.

widgets.name: Localizations
widgets.description: Defines the [Locale] for its `child` and the localized resources that the child depends on.

widgets.name: LongPressDraggable
widgets.description: Makes its child draggable starting from long press.

widgets.name: Material
widgets.description: A piece of material.

widgets.name: MaterialApp
widgets.description: An application that uses material design.

widgets.name: MaterialBanner
widgets.description: A Material Design banner.

widgets.name: MaterialBannerTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for [MaterialBanner]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: MaterialButton
widgets.description: A utility class for building Material buttons that depend on the ambient [ButtonTheme] and [Theme].

widgets.name: MediaQuery
widgets.description: Establishes a subtree in which media queries resolve to the given data.

widgets.name: MergeSemantics
widgets.description: A widget that merges the semantics of its descendants.

widgets.name: MergeableMaterial
widgets.description: Displays a list of [MergeableMaterialItem] children. The list contains [MaterialSlice] items whose boundaries are either "merged" with adjacent items or separated by a [MaterialGap]. The [children] are distributed along the given [mainAxis] in the same way as the children of a [ListBody]. When the list of children changes, gaps are automatically animated open or closed as needed.

widgets.name: MetaData
widgets.description: Holds opaque meta data in the render tree.

widgets.name: ModalBarrier
widgets.description: A widget that prevents the user from interacting with widgets behind itself.

widgets.name: MouseRegion
widgets.description: A widget that tracks the movement of mice.

widgets.name: MultiChildRenderObjectWidget
widgets.description: A superclass for [RenderObjectWidget]s that configure [RenderObject] subclasses that have a single list of children. (This superclass only provides the storage for that child list, it doesn't actually provide the updating logic.)

widgets.name: NavigationBar
widgets.description: Material 3 Navigation Bar component.

widgets.name: NavigationBarTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines visual properties for [NavigationBar]s and [NavigationDestination]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: NavigationDestination
widgets.description: Destination Widget for displaying Icons + labels in the Material 3 Navigation Bars through [NavigationBar.destinations].

widgets.name: NavigationIndicator
widgets.description: Selection Indicator for the Material 3 [NavigationBar] and [NavigationRail] components.

widgets.name: NavigationRail
widgets.description: A material widget that is meant to be displayed at the left or right of an app to navigate between a small number of views, typically between three and five.

widgets.name: NavigationRailTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines visual properties for [NavigationRail]s and [NavigationRailDestination]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: NavigationToolbar
widgets.description: [NavigationToolbar] is a layout helper to position 3 widgets or groups of widgets along a horizontal axis that's sensible for an application's navigation bar such as in Material Design and in iOS.

widgets.name: Navigator
widgets.description: A widget that manages a set of child widgets with a stack discipline.

widgets.name: NestedScrollView
widgets.description: A scrolling view inside of which can be nested other scrolling views, with their scroll positions being intrinsically linked.

widgets.name: NestedScrollViewViewport
widgets.description: The [Viewport] variant used by [NestedScrollView].

widgets.name: NotificationListener
widgets.description: A widget that listens for [Notification]s bubbling up the tree.

widgets.name: ObstructingPreferredSizeWidget
widgets.description: Widget that has a preferred size and reports whether it fully obstructs widgets behind it.

widgets.name: Offstage
widgets.description: A widget that lays the child out as if it was in the tree, but without painting anything, without making the child available for hit testing, and without taking any room in the parent.

widgets.name: Opacity
widgets.description: A widget that makes its child partially transparent.

widgets.name: OrientationBuilder
widgets.description: Builds a widget tree that can depend on the parent widget's orientation (distinct from the device orientation).

widgets.name: OutlinedButton
widgets.description: A Material Design "Outlined Button"; essentially a [TextButton] with an outlined border.

widgets.name: OutlinedButtonTheme
widgets.description: Overrides the default [ButtonStyle] of its [OutlinedButton] descendants.

widgets.name: OverflowBar
widgets.description: A widget that lays out its [children] in a row unless they "overflow" the available horizontal space, in which case it lays them out in a column instead.

widgets.name: OverflowBox
widgets.description: A widget that imposes different constraints on its child than it gets from its parent, possibly allowing the child to overflow the parent.

widgets.name: Overlay
widgets.description: A stack of entries that can be managed independently.

widgets.name: Padding
widgets.description: A widget that insets its child by the given padding.

widgets.name: PageStorage
widgets.description: Establish a subtree in which widgets can opt into persisting states after being destroyed.

widgets.name: PageView
widgets.description: A scrollable list that works page by page.

widgets.name: PaginatedDataTable
widgets.description: A material design data table that shows data using multiple pages.

widgets.name: ParentDataWidget
widgets.description: Base class for widgets that hook [ParentData] information to children of [RenderObjectWidget]s.

widgets.name: PerformanceOverlay
widgets.description: Displays performance statistics.

widgets.name: PhysicalModel
widgets.description: A widget representing a physical layer that clips its children to a shape.

widgets.name: PhysicalShape
widgets.description: A widget representing a physical layer that clips its children to a path.

widgets.name: Placeholder
widgets.description: A widget that draws a box that represents where other widgets will one day be added.

widgets.name: PlatformMenuBar
widgets.description: A menu bar that uses the platform's native APIs to construct and render a menu described by a [PlatformMenu]/[PlatformMenuItem] hierarchy.

widgets.name: PlatformViewLink
widgets.description: Links a platform view with the Flutter framework.

widgets.name: PlatformViewSurface
widgets.description: Integrates a platform view with Flutter's compositor, touch, and semantics subsystems.

widgets.name: PopupMenuButton
widgets.description: Displays a menu when pressed and calls [onSelected] when the menu is dismissed because an item was selected. The value passed to [onSelected] is the value of the selected menu item.

widgets.name: PopupMenuDivider
widgets.description: A horizontal divider in a material design popup menu.

widgets.name: PopupMenuEntry
widgets.description: A base class for entries in a material design popup menu.

widgets.name: PopupMenuItem
widgets.description: An item in a material design popup menu.

widgets.name: PopupMenuTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for popup menus in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: Positioned
widgets.description: A widget that controls where a child of a [Stack] is positioned.

widgets.name: PositionedDirectional
widgets.description: A widget that controls where a child of a [Stack] is positioned without committing to a specific [TextDirection].

widgets.name: PositionedTransition
widgets.description: Animated version of [Positioned] which takes a specific [Animation<RelativeRect>] to transition the child's position from a start position to an end position over the lifetime of the animation.

widgets.name: PreferredSize
widgets.description: A widget with a preferred size.

widgets.name: PreferredSizeWidget
widgets.description: An interface for widgets that can return the size this widget would prefer if it were otherwise unconstrained.

widgets.name: PrimaryScrollController
widgets.description: Associates a [ScrollController] with a subtree.

widgets.name: ProgressIndicator
widgets.description: A base class for material design progress indicators.

widgets.name: ProgressIndicatorTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for [ProgressIndicator]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: ProxyWidget
widgets.description: A widget that has a child widget provided to it, instead of building a new widget.

widgets.name: Radio
widgets.description: A material design radio button.

widgets.name: RadioListTile
widgets.description: A [ListTile] with a [Radio]. In other words, a radio button with a label.

widgets.name: RadioTheme
widgets.description: Applies a radio theme to descendant [Radio] widgets.

widgets.name: RangeSlider
widgets.description: A Material Design range slider.

widgets.name: RawAutocomplete
widgets.description: {@template flutter.widgets.RawAutocomplete.RawAutocomplete} A widget for helping the user make a selection by entering some text and choosing from among a list of options.

widgets.name: RawChip
widgets.description: A raw material design chip.

widgets.name: RawGestureDetector
widgets.description: A widget that detects gestures described by the given gesture factories.

widgets.name: RawImage
widgets.description: A widget that displays a [dart:ui.Image] directly.

widgets.name: RawKeyboardListener
widgets.description: A widget that calls a callback whenever the user presses or releases a key on a keyboard.

widgets.name: RawMaterialButton
widgets.description: Creates a button based on [Semantics], [Material], and [InkWell] widgets.

widgets.name: RawScrollbar
widgets.description: An extendable base class for building scrollbars that fade in and out.

widgets.name: RefreshIndicator
widgets.description: A widget that supports the Material "swipe to refresh" idiom.

widgets.name: RefreshProgressIndicator
widgets.description: An indicator for the progress of refreshing the contents of a widget.

widgets.name: RelativePositionedTransition
widgets.description: Animated version of [Positioned] which transitions the child's position based on the value of [rect] relative to a bounding box with the specified [size].

widgets.name: RenderObjectToWidgetAdapter
widgets.description: A bridge from a [RenderObject] to an [Element] tree.

widgets.name: RenderObjectWidget
widgets.description: RenderObjectWidgets provide the configuration for [RenderObjectElement]s, which wrap [RenderObject]s, which provide the actual rendering of the application.

widgets.name: ReorderableDelayedDragStartListener
widgets.description: A wrapper widget that will recognize the start of a drag operation by looking for a long press event. Once it is recognized, it will start a drag operation on the wrapped item in the reorderable list.

widgets.name: ReorderableDragStartListener
widgets.description: A wrapper widget that will recognize the start of a drag on the wrapped widget by a [PointerDownEvent], and immediately initiate dragging the wrapped item to a new location in a reorderable list.

widgets.name: ReorderableList
widgets.description: A scrolling container that allows the user to interactively reorder the list items.

widgets.name: ReorderableListView
widgets.description: A list whose items the user can interactively reorder by dragging.

widgets.name: RepaintBoundary
widgets.description: A widget that creates a separate display list for its child.

widgets.name: RestorationScope
widgets.description: Creates a new scope for restoration IDs used by descendant widgets to claim [RestorationBucket]s.

widgets.name: RichText
widgets.description: A paragraph of rich text.

widgets.name: RootRestorationScope
widgets.description: Inserts a child bucket of [RestorationManager.rootBucket] into the widget tree and makes it available to descendants via [RestorationScope.of].

widgets.name: RotatedBox
widgets.description: A widget that rotates its child by a integral number of quarter turns.

widgets.name: RotationTransition
widgets.description: Animates the rotation of a widget.

widgets.name: Router
widgets.description: The dispatcher for opening and closing pages of an application.

widgets.name: Row
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in a horizontal array.

widgets.name: SafeArea
widgets.description: A widget that insets its child by sufficient padding to avoid intrusions by the operating system.

widgets.name: Scaffold
widgets.description: Implements the basic material design visual layout structure.

widgets.name: ScaffoldMessenger
widgets.description: Manages [SnackBar]s and [MaterialBanner]s for descendant [Scaffold]s.

widgets.name: ScaleTransition
widgets.description: Animates the scale of a transformed widget.

widgets.name: ScrollConfiguration
widgets.description: Controls how [Scrollable] widgets behave in a subtree.

widgets.name: ScrollNotificationObserver
widgets.description: Notifies its listeners when a descendant scrolls.

widgets.name: ScrollView
widgets.description: A widget that scrolls.

widgets.name: Scrollable
widgets.description: A widget that scrolls.

widgets.name: Scrollbar
widgets.description: A Material Design scrollbar.

widgets.name: ScrollbarTheme
widgets.description: Applies a scrollbar theme to descendant [Scrollbar] widgets.

widgets.name: SelectableText
widgets.description: A run of selectable text with a single style.

widgets.name: Semantics
widgets.description: A widget that annotates the widget tree with a description of the meaning of the widgets.

widgets.name: SemanticsDebugger
widgets.description: A widget that visualizes the semantics for the child.

widgets.name: ShaderMask
widgets.description: A widget that applies a mask generated by a [Shader] to its child.

widgets.name: SharedAppData
widgets.description: Enables sharing key/value data with its `child` and all of the child's descendants.

widgets.name: Shortcuts
widgets.description: A widget that creates key bindings to specific actions for its descendants.

widgets.name: ShrinkWrappingViewport
widgets.description: A widget that is bigger on the inside and shrink wraps its children in the main axis.

widgets.name: SimpleDialog
widgets.description: A simple material design dialog.

widgets.name: SimpleDialogOption
widgets.description: An option used in a [SimpleDialog].

widgets.name: SingleChildRenderObjectWidget
widgets.description: A superclass for [RenderObjectWidget]s that configure [RenderObject] subclasses that have a single child slot. (This superclass only provides the storage for that child, it doesn't actually provide the updating logic.)

widgets.name: SingleChildScrollView
widgets.description: A box in which a single widget can be scrolled.

widgets.name: SizeChangedLayoutNotifier
widgets.description: A widget that automatically dispatches a [SizeChangedLayoutNotification] when the layout dimensions of its child change.

widgets.name: SizeTransition
widgets.description: Animates its own size and clips and aligns its child.

widgets.name: SizedBox
widgets.description: A box with a specified size.

widgets.name: SizedOverflowBox
widgets.description: A widget that is a specific size but passes its original constraints through to its child, which may then overflow.

widgets.name: SlideTransition
widgets.description: Animates the position of a widget relative to its normal position.

widgets.name: Slider
widgets.description: A Material Design slider.

widgets.name: SliderTheme
widgets.description: Applies a slider theme to descendant [Slider] widgets.

widgets.name: SliverAnimatedList
widgets.description: A sliver that animates items when they are inserted or removed.

widgets.name: SliverAnimatedOpacity
widgets.description: Animated version of [SliverOpacity] which automatically transitions the sliver child's opacity over a given duration whenever the given opacity changes.

widgets.name: SliverAppBar
widgets.description: A material design app bar that integrates with a [CustomScrollView].

widgets.name: SliverFadeTransition
widgets.description: Animates the opacity of a sliver widget.

widgets.name: SliverFillRemaining
widgets.description: A sliver that contains a single box child that fills the remaining space in the viewport.

widgets.name: SliverFillViewport
widgets.description: A sliver that contains multiple box children that each fills the viewport.

widgets.name: SliverFixedExtentList
widgets.description: A sliver that places multiple box children with the same main axis extent in a linear array.

widgets.name: SliverGrid
widgets.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a two dimensional arrangement.

widgets.name: SliverIgnorePointer
widgets.description: A sliver widget that is invisible during hit testing.

widgets.name: SliverLayoutBuilder
widgets.description: Builds a sliver widget tree that can depend on its own [SliverConstraints].

widgets.name: SliverList
widgets.description: A sliver that places multiple box children in a linear array along the main axis.

widgets.name: SliverMultiBoxAdaptorWidget
widgets.description: A base class for sliver that have multiple box children.

widgets.name: SliverOffstage
widgets.description: A sliver that lays its sliver child out as if it was in the tree, but without painting anything, without making the sliver child available for hit testing, and without taking any room in the parent.

widgets.name: SliverOpacity
widgets.description: A sliver widget that makes its sliver child partially transparent.

widgets.name: SliverOverlapAbsorber
widgets.description: A sliver that wraps another, forcing its layout extent to be treated as overlap.

widgets.name: SliverOverlapInjector
widgets.description: A sliver that has a sliver geometry based on the values stored in a [SliverOverlapAbsorberHandle].

widgets.name: SliverPadding
widgets.description: A sliver that applies padding on each side of another sliver.

widgets.name: SliverPersistentHeader
widgets.description: A sliver whose size varies when the sliver is scrolled to the edge of the viewport opposite the sliver's [GrowthDirection].

widgets.name: SliverPrototypeExtentList
widgets.description: A sliver that places its box children in a linear array and constrains them to have the same extent as a prototype item along the main axis.

widgets.name: SliverReorderableList
widgets.description: A sliver list that allows the user to interactively reorder the list items.

widgets.name: SliverSafeArea
widgets.description: A sliver that insets another sliver by sufficient padding to avoid intrusions by the operating system.

widgets.name: SliverToBoxAdapter
widgets.description: A sliver that contains a single box widget.

widgets.name: SliverVisibility
widgets.description: Whether to show or hide a sliver child.

widgets.name: SliverWithKeepAliveWidget
widgets.description: A base class for sliver that have [KeepAlive] children.

widgets.name: SnackBar
widgets.description: A lightweight message with an optional action which briefly displays at the bottom of the screen.

widgets.name: SnackBarAction
widgets.description: A button for a [SnackBar], known as an "action".

widgets.name: Spacer
widgets.description: Spacer creates an adjustable, empty spacer that can be used to tune the spacing between widgets in a [Flex] container, like [Row] or [Column].

widgets.name: Stack
widgets.description: A widget that positions its children relative to the edges of its box.

widgets.name: StatefulBuilder
widgets.description: A platonic widget that both has state and calls a closure to obtain its child widget.

widgets.name: StatefulWidget
widgets.description: A widget that has mutable state.

widgets.name: StatelessWidget
widgets.description: A widget that does not require mutable state.

widgets.name: StatusTransitionWidget
widgets.description: A widget that rebuilds when the given animation changes status.

widgets.name: Stepper
widgets.description: A material stepper widget that displays progress through a sequence of steps. Steppers are particularly useful in the case of forms where one step requires the completion of another one, or where multiple steps need to be completed in order to submit the whole form.

widgets.name: StreamBuilder
widgets.description: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a [Stream].

widgets.name: StreamBuilderBase
widgets.description: Base class for widgets that build themselves based on interaction with a specified [Stream].

widgets.name: StretchingOverscrollIndicator
widgets.description: A Material Design visual indication that a scroll view has overscrolled.

widgets.name: Switch
widgets.description: A material design switch.

widgets.name: SwitchListTile
widgets.description: A [ListTile] with a [Switch]. In other words, a switch with a label.

widgets.name: SwitchTheme
widgets.description: Applies a switch theme to descendant [Switch] widgets.

widgets.name: Tab
widgets.description: A material design [TabBar] tab.

widgets.name: TabBar
widgets.description: A material design widget that displays a horizontal row of tabs.

widgets.name: TabBarView
widgets.description: A page view that displays the widget which corresponds to the currently selected tab.

widgets.name: TabPageSelector
widgets.description: Uses [TabPageSelectorIndicator] to display a row of small circular indicators, one per tab.

widgets.name: TabPageSelectorIndicator
widgets.description: Displays a single circle with the specified size, border style, border color and background colors.

widgets.name: Table
widgets.description: A widget that uses the table layout algorithm for its children.

widgets.name: TableCell
widgets.description: A widget that controls how a child of a [Table] is aligned.

widgets.name: TableRowInkWell
widgets.description: A rectangular area of a Material that responds to touch but clips its ink splashes to the current table row of the nearest table.

widgets.name: Text
widgets.description: A run of text with a single style.

widgets.name: TextButton
widgets.description: A Material Design "Text Button".

widgets.name: TextButtonTheme
widgets.description: Overrides the default [ButtonStyle] of its [TextButton] descendants.

widgets.name: TextField
widgets.description: A material design text field.

widgets.name: TextFormField
widgets.description: A [FormField] that contains a [TextField].

widgets.name: TextSelectionGestureDetector
widgets.description: A gesture detector to respond to non-exclusive event chains for a text field.

widgets.name: TextSelectionTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the appearance of text selection in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: TextSelectionToolbar
widgets.description: A fully-functional Material-style text selection toolbar.

widgets.name: TextSelectionToolbarTextButton
widgets.description: A button styled like a Material native Android text selection menu button.

widgets.name: Texture
widgets.description: A rectangle upon which a backend texture is mapped.

widgets.name: Theme
widgets.description: Applies a theme to descendant widgets.

widgets.name: TickerMode
widgets.description: Enables or disables tickers (and thus animation controllers) in the widget subtree.

widgets.name: TimePickerDialog
widgets.description: A material design time picker designed to appear inside a popup dialog.

widgets.name: TimePickerTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for time pickers displayed using [showTimePicker] in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: Title
widgets.description: A widget that describes this app in the operating system.

widgets.name: ToggleButtons
widgets.description: A set of toggle buttons.

widgets.name: ToggleButtonsTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines color and border parameters for [ToggleButtons] in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: Tooltip
widgets.description: A material design tooltip.

widgets.name: TooltipTheme
widgets.description: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for [Tooltip]s in this widget's subtree.

widgets.name: TooltipVisibility
widgets.description: Overrides the visibility of descendant [Tooltip] widgets.

widgets.name: Transform
widgets.description: A widget that applies a transformation before painting its child.

widgets.name: TweenAnimationBuilder
widgets.description: [Widget] builder that animates a property of a [Widget] to a target value whenever the target value changes.

widgets.name: UiKitView
widgets.description: Embeds an iOS view in the Widget hierarchy.

widgets.name: UnconstrainedBox
widgets.description: A widget that imposes no constraints on its child, allowing it to render at its "natural" size.

widgets.name: UniqueWidget
widgets.description: Base class for stateful widgets that have exactly one inflated instance in the tree.

widgets.name: UnmanagedRestorationScope
widgets.description: Inserts a provided [RestorationBucket] into the widget tree and makes it available to descendants via [RestorationScope.of].

widgets.name: UserAccountsDrawerHeader
widgets.description: A material design [Drawer] header that identifies the app's user.

widgets.name: ValueListenableBuilder
widgets.description: A widget whose content stays synced with a [ValueListenable].

widgets.name: VerticalDivider
widgets.description: A thin vertical line, with padding on either side.

widgets.name: Viewport
widgets.description: A widget that is bigger on the inside.

widgets.name: Visibility
widgets.description: Whether to show or hide a child.

widgets.name: WidgetInspector
widgets.description: A widget that enables inspecting the child widget's structure.

widgets.name: WidgetToRenderBoxAdapter
widgets.description: An adapter for placing a specific [RenderBox] in the widget tree.

widgets.name: WidgetsApp
widgets.description: A convenience widget that wraps a number of widgets that are commonly required for an application.

widgets.name: WillPopScope
widgets.description: Registers a callback to veto attempts by the user to dismiss the enclosing [ModalRoute].

widgets.name: Wrap
widgets.description: A widget that displays its children in multiple horizontal or vertical runs.

widgets.name: YearPicker
widgets.description: A scrollable grid of years to allow picking a year.
